## Code

```{.lisp code-line-numbers="1,3,7"}
(defun reprex ()
  "Create a reprex from the region"
  (interactive)
  (save-excursion
	(if (use-region-p)
	    (kill-ring-save (region-beginning) (region-end)))
	(ess-eval-linewise "reprex::reprex()" "Creating reprex" nil nil)
    ))
```
